ing: 1 (15 ounce) can black beans, rinsed and drained
1 (10 ounce) can white shoepeg corn, drained
des: "This mango salsa goes great with your favorite tortilla chips or as a topping for grilled chicken or fish! It only takes a handful of ingredients and is ready in just minutes!"
ins: Stir the diced mango, black beans, corn, cilantro, lime juice, salt, and pepper together in a bowl. Chill at least 1 hour before serving.
